channel.title: Data Science on Beyond Lambda
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Beyond Lambda

item.title: Why Data Science Project Fail?
item.description: I recently read Why Data Science Projects Fail: The Harsh Realities of Implementing AI and Analytics, without the Hype. It is a great book that talks about what why many data science projects fail. It is a very informative read and I suggest you check it out. In this post I will give a very quick summary of what I learned for my future self.
